function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and confinement of indoor spaces leading to efficient spread of COVID-19 particles in buildings.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases transmission and COVID-19 spread in built facilities.","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor ventilation, improve air filters, maintain HVAC systems, use portable air cleaners, adopt ultraviolet germicidal irradiation.","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters (MERV-13), portable air cleaners with HEPA filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation.","People":"Building occupants, employees, visitors, customers.","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC system operators, public health authorities."}]}
